QuestData.Title: Just Encased
QuestData.Description: You should have seen me fight! I must have killed six of those beasts, when...$b$bOh wait, you can count the bodies, can't you? OK, fine. I killed four of them, when the fifth one shot me with this web. To make things even worse... when he blasted me with web juice, my mouth was open!$b$bI can't seem to break these webs, and I doubt you'll be able to, either. No, you'll have to get some of the stomach juice from those undead spider-things. That'll do the trick.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 8 vials of Crypt Bile from nerubians in Terrorweb Tunnel.
QuestData.CompletionText: Oh boy... Fiona is going to be madder than a wet harpy. You'd better hurry.
QuestData.RewardText: You're back?! Thank the Light!$b$bBefore you throw that acid on me, I need to ask: Are you the $g guy: girl; who was here before, or are you one of those eight-legged cowards? I need to know whether or not I should smack you on my way out.
